Technique/Measure: Test Case Execution from Cause Consequence Diagrams

Comment:
GNATtest can be used to implement \
tests coming from boundary value analysis.

Technique/Measure: Equivalence Classes and Input Partitioning Testing
Comment:
Ada and \
SPARK provide specific features for partitioning function input and \
verifying that this partitioning is well formed (i.e., no overlap and \
no gaps).
